name: Terror Over Toilet Town
description:
WARNING: CONTAINS CRUDE LANGUAGE

Ten Terrible Toilets - and it's Time to Turd.

Ten toilets stand before you - Put your toilet selection skills to the test and choose the least worst toilet to shit in. A torrent of atrocious toilets awaits.

You can play free in the browser, or for you data horders out there, $1 for the stand-alone download.
